title: Find your favorite past login screens!

replies.body: Make it optional to change your log in screen please <3

http://www.leaguelsi.com/
You're welcome!!!
is this legit?
Yup, have been using lsi for over 4 months now never regretted it
No lag?
So what is the site like? and it dosnt mention anything about changing the log in screen on the site, is it supposed to? I'd love to change my background, but im worried about the risk.

It has many amazing features that are VERY worth the download.
The best part is that it's completely riot approved so there's ZERO risk
And if I wanted to change the log-In screen, how would I do that?

Client Utilities > Login Screen

Every login screen since Feb 20, 2009 is available. (some gaps)

You can set to static, or random.
About done. Downloaded it and downloaded one background, but it wont download any more. Mid download, the download section disappears. It a bug?
Oh please, this would be **too** epic for me to handle. {{summoner:11}}

At first i thought thats what this was :( 
OMEGA SQUAD FOR LIFE
Nothing Beats this Login Screen https://youtu.be/s6Ey7dcZWt0?t=12
id make that my login screen any day
WTH did i just watch LOL
Uh the best thing ever. DUH.

Is that new skin for Taric?
{{champion:44}}
That Diana login! Still give me the goosebumps.
I login Sr. just to up vote you
Glad Im not the only one. <3

You guys should really put these soundtracks more into the game instead of just log in screens.

Maybe a related theme plays when a champion/champion with specific skin gets a triple, quadra or pentakill for a minute or two.

I think it would actually be an extremely neat feature.
We do have all our soundtracks available on soundcloud for download: https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends
Thank you so much for providing a way for us to listen to the soundtracks whenever we want <3

Everytime I hear gnars music, I expect wukong to come out of nowhere pick him up, raise him in the air and yell

"Haaaaaaa Saven-yah! bumba-teek-muh-ahmo"

surrounded by all the league champs.
Everything in summoners rift is our kingdom
But what about the Twisted Treeline, the Howling Abyss, or the Crystal Scar?{{champion:150}}

"dad, what is that dark area over there?"
"That is the crystal scar Gnar, you must never go there"
I got all excited because I thought you could change your login screens. Thanks riot.

Best music - Braum
Best animation - Super Galaxy Rumble
Creepy as hell - Thresh
FOREVER DIANA LOG IN SCREEN! {{champion:131}}
Ofc, the first login screen with a new song!
Theoretically there was this "DRAVEN! DRAVEN! DRAVEN!" song before that.
7 more champions and I can make all the 69 jokes and not get downvoted. PLS RITO HURRY
The day there is an Ao Shin login screen I will cry
The URF login screen will always be my favorite. So cool and reminds me of the most recent shark week commercial. The Dunkmaster Darius one was pretty cool as well - too bad it's not on the playlist.
This is super cool, is there any place we can find all the still login screens in one spot?
We have a full playlist on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbAFXJC0J5GZHUtGea_zQR0OyD3UBuw9s
you're missing Lulu's
The Purifier's Resolve is undoubtedly, 100%, with zero room for dispute, the best login screen ever.
The memories...{{item:3070}}

Pool Party - Super Galaxy Rumble - 2014 World Championship - Gnar - DJ Sona - Omega Squad Teemo... 

HEY!!! I though URF 2015 has Login Screen!!! or I mistaken maybe???
You are not wrong, I neglected to add it to the playlist. It's here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qYIiy03eGE0
The only login screen I want, is one that was on the pbe for a short time. It looked likethe beta login screen https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jg0JIVPe3Gk :'(
The Bard log in screen is to old and i feel like it should be updated
Wait, Underworld Galio?? Isn't it gatekeeper?
I remember they did call it gatekeeper galio :3

Playlist seems to be missing the brief [Ascension/Shurima Crest login screen](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N5vmO6xJxFs)

Lulu and Winter Wonderland Orianna too.

EDIT: Seems they're getting the Shurima one in as we speak. Nice punctuality!
Here you go: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHMFp84xo64

Thank!

NOW THE REST
